titleStmt.title: A prayer and also a thankesgiuing vnto God for his great mercy in giuing, and preseruing our noble Queene Elizabeth, to liue and reigne ouer vs, to his honour and glory, and our comfort in Christ Iesus : to be sung the xvii day of Nouember 1577 / made by I. Pit, minister.
titleStmt.author: Pits, John.

notesStmt.note: "Sing this as the foure score and one Psalme."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
